      • list_Dirs_Files_Paths

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> list_Dirs_Files_Paths(java.lang.String dirname,
                                                                     boolean listDirs,
                                                                     boolean listFiles,
                                                                     boolean listPaths)
        Lists directories and/or filenames in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        dirname - The path and name of the directory to list.
        listDirs - If true directories are listed, if false directories are not listed.
        listFiles - If true files are listed, if false files are not listed.
        listPaths - If true the absolute paths will be listed, if false only filenames will be listed.
        Returns:
        A List of filenames (or filenames with paths) of the found directories and/or files.

      • list_ExistingFilesRecursive

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> list_ExistingFilesRecursive(java.lang.String dirname)
        Lists directories and/or filenames in the given directory.
        Parameters:
        dirname - The path and name of the directory to list.
        listPaths - If true the absolute paths will be listed, if false only filenames will be listed.
        Returns:
        A List of filenames (or filenames with paths) of the found files larger than 0 bytes.
